testsuite.name: application.LoginChatUseCaseTest

testcase.name: should create a new user and connection for incoming new user()
should not create a user for empty username()
should not create two users with same username()
should not create a user for empty password()

testsuite.system-out: DEBUG ---> User bruno registered successfully DEBUG ---> User bruno logged in to the system DEBUG ---> Empty username or password not allowed DEBUG ---> User bruno registered successfully DEBUG ---> User bruno logged in to the system DEBUG ---> The password provided for user bruno is incorrect DEBUG ---> Empty username or password not allowed
